Title: Politics
Writer: Noelle Valdivia, Tony Saltzman, David E. Kelley (created by), Jonathan Shapiro (created by)
Actors: Billy Bob Thornton, Nina Arianda, Ana de la Reguera, Tania Raymonde
Plot: After a brutal loss, Billy decides to formally take on Julio Suarez's defense, but before he can go back to court, he has to get his team back together first.
